channel.title: Update Server Help
channel.description:
Hey there, Me and my friend are a little new to private server's and were hoping for some help.
We have spent portions of today trying to figure it out, but nothing has seemed to work. We've been over port forwarding, trying different i.p's, and are finally stumped. So came to the forums hoping for a little help.
I'm sure this is a common problem, or an easy fix, we just need it pointing out to us.
We have a 508 Tokkulscape base, and the mezzyscape 508 client as suggested on the tokkulscape thread, and have successfully set it up to load and work on the host's computer. However, we then went and port forwarded, and upon arriving home, I can not connect to the game itself. It just seems to stop at "connecting to update server"
Is anyone able to point out what we have done/are doing wrong, and put us on the track to a fix? This would be greatly appreciated. Thanks all.

item.title: Update Server Help
item.dc:creator: @nz_lols nz lols

kk im the host and sent u tht info

item.title: Update Server Help
item.dc:creator: @HeyLewis HeyLewis
item.description:
@HeyLewis wrote:

Hey there, Me and my friend are a little new to private server’s and were hoping for some help.

We have spent portions of today trying to figure it out, but nothing has seemed to work.
We’ve been over port forwarding, trying different i.p’s, and are finally stumped. So came to the forums hoping for a little help.

I’m sure this is a common problem, or an easy fix, we just need it pointing out to us.

We have a 508 Tokkulscape base, and the mezzyscape 508 client as suggested on the tokkulscape thread, and have successfully set it up to load and work on the host’s computer.
However, we then went and port forwarded, and upon arriving home, I can not connect to the game itself.
It just seems to stop at “connecting to update server”

Is anyone able to point out what we have done/are doing wrong, and put us on the track to a fix?
This would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks all.
